trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule"></xref>.

The AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class.

You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Dostęp można uzyskać <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>zdarzenie <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>klasy, określając procedury o nazwie **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** w pliku Global.asax aplikacji ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest> event.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> constructs an <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>Tworzy <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>przy użyciu bieżącej <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>i przekazuje je do **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** zdarzeń.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object supplied to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value.
trans-unit.target: Można użyć <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>Właściwość <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>obiekt dostarczony do **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** zdarzeń, aby ustawić niestandardową wartość anonimowy identyfikator.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a <xref:System.Guid> is used.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli nie określisz wartości <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>właściwości podczas **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** zdarzenia <xref:System.Guid>jest używany.</xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when anonymous identification is <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A> by setting the configuration element to `true`.
trans-unit.target: **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** zdarzenie jest wywoływane tylko wtedy, gdy jest identyfikacja anonimowa <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>przez ustawienie dla elementu konfiguracji `true`.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>
